content.bio: Experienced Software Engineer with nearly 4 years of dedicated focus on researching, developing, and implementing cutting-edge AI applications and robust backend systems. Proficient in leveraging advanced technologies to drive innovation and deliver high-quality solutions.
highlights: Passionate about building Intelligent Systems which will transform the world.
Always learning and exploring new algorithms, techniques and languages.
Focused on creating scalable, production-ready ML systems.
Experienced in integrating Generative AI models (LLMs) to solve existing business problems.
Building effective AI agents with LLMs and Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG).

projects.title: AI Healthcare Chatbot
projects.description: Developed and deployed an AI healthcare chatbot leveraging cutting-edge RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) technique for enhanced conversational capabilities. Utilized Qdrant database for efficient storage and retrieval of proprietary document data.

projects.title: Content-Based Health Product Recommendation System
projects.description: Designed and implemented a sophisticated Content-Based Recommendation System tailored for health products, leveraging user's recent medical history for personalized recommendations. Utilized Neo4j graph database with advanced vector similarity search.

projects.title: Graph Neural Networks for Molecule Properties Prediction
projects.description: Built Graph Neural Networks (GNNs), specifically Graph Convolutional Networks (GCNs) to predict properties of molecules. Represented the molecular data in a graph format, with atoms being the nodes and bonds being the edges, allowing the GCNs to learn various properties of the molecule.

projects.title: Customer Service Agent
projects.description: Utilized the DeepSeek API with custom prompts as the foundation for the agent. Built several database querying tools for the agent to use when required. Used SQLite as the database and FastHTML as the full stack framework for easy integration with Python code.

projects.title: Capstone Project Recommender System (CPRS)
projects.description: Developed a personalized content-based recommender system, aligning students with suitable projects based on their skills and interests. Implemented TF-IDF technique to construct the recommendation engine.

projects.title: Multi-Lingual BPE Tokenizer
projects.description: Created a Multi-Lingual BPE Tokenizer using Byte-Pair Encoding inspired by GPT4, implemented in Julia. The tokenizer encodes characters into unicode representations and optimizes vocabulary by grouping frequently used byte pairs.

content.availability: Open to new and exciting opportunities

achievements: Developed and deployed an AI healthcare chatbot leveraging cutting-edge RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) technique for enhanced conversational capabilities.
Utilized Qdrant database for efficient storage and retrieval of proprietary document data, ensuring secure and scalable data management.
Employed open-source LLM (Large Language Model) models to generate accurate answers from retrieved documents, enhancing the chatbot's responsiveness and effectiveness.
Significantly contributed to reducing customer service overhead by providing timely and accurate responses, improving customer satisfaction and operational efficiency.
Designed and implemented a sophisticated Content-Based Recommendation System tailored for health products, leveraging user's recent medical history for personalized recommendations.
Utilized Neo4j graph database with advanced vector similarity search capabilities to efficiently search and retrieve relevant products based on user profiles and preferences.
Implemented advanced filtering mechanisms to refine product recommendations based on specific criteria such as allergens, gender suitability, and other relevant factors.
Enhanced user experience by delivering accurate and personalized product recommendations aligned with individual health needs and preferences, promoting user engagement and satisfaction.

certifications.name: Improving Deep Neural Networks: Hyperparameter Tuning, Regularization, and Optimization
